news.title: Market opens steady
news.summary: U.S. equities hold gains as investors digest a heavier earnings slate and watch rates drift lower into the close.

news.title: Tech leads rally
news.summary: Mega-cap tech pushes indices higher with broad strength in semis and software offsetting weakness in energy names.

news.title: Rates in focus
news.summary: Bond yields ease ahead of central bank remarks while futures price in a slower pace of hikes through year-end.

news.title: BTC inches up
news.summary: Bitcoin trades higher alongside broader risk assets as volatility stays muted and volumes remain light.

news.title: Energy softens
news.summary: Oil retreats on easing supply concerns and a stronger dollar, with traders eyeing upcoming inventory data.

news.title: Earnings surprise
news.summary: Select industrials beat estimates on strong demand and improved margins, lifting guidance for the quarter.

news.title: Consumer sentiment
news.summary: Latest survey shows steady confidence into year-end, with spending plans holding despite higher borrowing costs.

news.title: Global markets
news.summary: European equities close mixed; Asia finishes higher as tech and autos outperform while exporters lag.
